Actions.Name: Toxion
Actions.Effects: Poisoned foes are shoved 2 in a direction of the Boil's choice.

Actions.Name: Sporeseed
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is branded.

Actions.Name: Noxious Cloud
Actions.Description: The Boil creates a choking cloud, a blast 1 terrain effect, in range 4. Characters in the cloud have cover but the area is dangerous terrain and they take +1 curse on attack rolls. Lowlanders are immune to its effects. The cloud lasts until this ability is used again.

Actions.Name: Adrenalize
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they gain +1 boon on attacks and deal bonus damage with all abilities. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain regeneration.

Actions.Name: Catalyze
Actions.Description: A character in range 5 must save. On a successful save, they are poisoned. On a failed save, they become marked by the Boil.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the effect of lowlander toxin on them is tripled.
